column4: seveas, yes i would do that but until i get cedega to work i want a back up of my games

I could be wrong, but last I checked, using qparted to edit NTFS partitions was a very bad idea (data loss nearly guaranteed).  That said, if you defragment your ntfs filesystem, you might be able to shrink it more
it wont let me make the partition smaller at all.... i have a 32gb partitions and theres only 15gb data
also, while the free tools don't do a good job for that particular task, there are some inexpensive commercial tools that you might try.  Partition Magic worked well back in the day.
